fields.name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
fields.description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

fields.name: Zootopia
fields.description: From the largest elephant to the smallest shrew, the city of Zootopia is a mammal metropolis where various animals live and thrive. When Judy Hopps becomes the first rabbit to join the police force, she quickly learns how tough it is to enforce the law.

fields.name: Murder on the Orient Express
fields.description: When a murder occurs on the train on which he's travelling, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

fields.name: Knives Out
fields.description: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

fields.name: Clue
fields.description: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up

fields.name: Murder on the Orient Express
fields.description: In December 1935, when his train is stopped by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before.

fields.name: Scream
fields.description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

fields.name: The Nice Guys
fields.description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

fields.name: Chinatown
fields.description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

fields.name: Gosford Park
fields.description: Set in the 1930s, this movie brings a group of pretentious rich and famous together for a weekend of relaxation at a hunting resort. But when a murder occurs, each one of these interesting characters becomes a suspect.

fields.name: Zero Effect
fields.description: The world's greatest detective Daryl Zero aided by his associate Steve Arlo investigates a complex and mysterious case of blackmail and missing keys for shady tycoon Gregory Stark who is less than forthcoming about what is really happening!

fields.name: Detective Pikachu
fields.description: In a world where people collect Pok√©mon to do battle, a boy comes across an intelligent talking Pikachu who seeks to be a detective.

fields.name: Sherlock Holmes
fields.description: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

fields.name: Brick
fields.description: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.

fields.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
fields.description: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

fields.name: Gone Girl
fields.description: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

fields.name: Prisoners
fields.description: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

fields.name: Identity
fields.description: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

fields.name: The Hateful Eight
fields.description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

fields.name: The Usual Suspects
fields.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

fields.name: Game Night
fields.description: A group of friends who meet regularly for game nights find themselves entangled in a real-life mystery when the shady brother of one of them is seemingly kidnapped by dangerous gangsters.

fields.name: Minority Report
fields.description: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
